name: Isocraft2
description:
Minecraft, but Isometric! courtesy Dani Maccari for the tileset

https://dani-maccari.itch.io/tiny-blocks-isometric-pixel-assets

Tiles^^

CURRENT NEWS

The current Prototype exists solely to test the block breaking, mouse movement, and world gen. It is not representative of the future full release (especially cause its missing a player lol) current controls are as such

ScrollWheel: zoom in and out

Left click(on top face of bottom most block of a column to mine topmost block)

after "Mining" every block the next demo world will load, there are two currently and they loop.
